mapper.sql: id, uuid, code, parent_code, group_code, name, url, is_usable, create_user, DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as create_time, update_user, DATE_FORMAT(update_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as update_time
mapper.insert:
insert into sys_menu
uuid, code,
parent_code,
group_code, name,
url,
is_usable,
create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time,
#{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{parentCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{groupCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update sys_menu
parent_code = #{parentCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
group_code = #{groupCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_usable = #{isUsable,jdbcType=INTEGER},
update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = STR_TO_DATE(#{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'),
where `code` = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
